stimulusHtml: What is printed as a result of executing this code segment?

features.html:
Consider the following class definition.

 

public class Stars 
{
   private int size; 
   private int width; 
	 
   public Stars(int n, int w) 
   {
      size = n; 
      width = w; 
   } 

   public void draw(int size) 
   {
      for (int i = 1; i <= size; i++) 
      {
         line(i, width - 1); 
      }
   } 

   public void line(int n, int width) 
   {
      for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) 
      {
         for (int j = 0; j < width; j++) 
         {
            System.out.print("*"); 
         }              
      }
      System.out.println(); 
   }
}

 

The following code segment appears in a class other than  Stars.

 

Stars s = new Stars(3, 2); 
s.draw(5);
